mapper.select: select count(contract_no) from contracts c join contract_template ct on c.template_seq = ct.template_seq join contract_template_details ctd on ct.template_seq = ctd.template_seq where doc_status ='PRCS1001' and process_status in ('PRCS2001','PRCS2002') and del_yn ='N' and emp_no =#{empNo}

SELECT c.contract_no /*getContractWaitsList*/ , c.emp_no , c.template_seq , c.doc_status , c.process_status , c.signature_data_no , c.validation , c.agree_yn , c.del_yn , c.created_by , c.created_at , c.updated_by , c.updated_at , c.name ,ctd.contract_title_en from contracts c join contract_template ct on c.template_seq = ct.template_seq join contract_template_details ctd on ct.template_seq = ctd.template_seq where c.del_yn = 'N' and doc_status ='PRCS1001' and process_status in ('PRCS2001','PRCS2002') and emp_no = #{empNo} LIMIT #{paging.displayRow} OFFSET #{paging.offset}

SELECT c.contract_no /*getContractWaitInfo*/ , c.emp_no , c.template_seq , c.doc_status , c.process_status , c.signature_data_no , c.validation , c.agree_yn , c.del_yn , c.created_by , c.created_at , c.updated_by , c.updated_at , c.name ,ctd.contract_title_en from contracts c join contract_template ct on c.template_seq = ct.template_seq join contract_template_details ctd on ct.template_seq = ctd.template_seq where c.del_yn = 'N' and doc_status ='PRCS1001' and process_status in ('PRCS2001','PRCS2002') and emp_no = #{empNo} and c.contract_no = #{contractNo}
